mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ${material}_sprocket ( id INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY, spindle_id INT NOT NULL, widget_id INT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_${material}_sprocket_id PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_${material}_sprocket_spindle_id FOREIGN KEY (spindle_id) REFERENCES ${material}_spindle (id), CONSTRAINT fk_${material}_sprocket_widget_id FOREIGN KEY (widget_id) REFERENCES widget (id) );
